general.title: Join the Inner Circle.
general.subtitle: Unlock Founder Benefits Before They're Gone.

general.title: Spaces are limited.
general.subtitle: Secure your spot as a Founding Member today.

creator.title: Ready to turn your content into a career?
creator.subtitle: Join as a Founding Creator.

brand.title: Tired of fake engagement?
brand.subtitle: Connect with Morocco's most authentic creators.

footer.copyright: © 2024 VibeMatch. Built in Casablanca for Morocco.

hero.subtitle: No more fake engagement. No more late payments. VibeMatch is the Vetted-Influencer Marketplace for Morocco's best brands and creators.

brands.description: We provide vetted creators and guaranteed results. Our revolutionary Trust Engine analyzes over 50 data points to ensure every influencer you partner with has a genuine, engaged audience. No more bots, no more vanity metrics. Just real impact.

ctas.text: For visionary brands ready for real ROI.
Waitlist spots are limited. Secure your priority access.
The top 1% of Moroccan creators are waiting.
Stop gambling. Start getting guaranteed results.

creators.description: Focus on what you do best: creating amazing content. VibeMatch handles the boring stuff. We guarantee your payments and automate your invoices, so you can build your brand with peace of mind.

ctas.text: For the top 1% of creators who value their time.
Tired of chasing payments? We automate them.
Limited spots for Founding Creators are now open.
Unlock partnerships with Morocco's leading brands.

shield.title: Your Shield Against Fake Engagement
shield.description: Stop wondering if an audience is real. Our proprietary "Trust Score" and manual vetting process eliminate creators with suspicious engagement. Every creator on VibeMatch is verified for authenticity.

deadlines.title: Guaranteed Deadlines, Not Excuses
deadlines.description: No more "I forgot to post." Our Smart Contract locks in the exact publication dates. If a creator is late, their Trust Score gets penalized, protecting you and your campaign schedule.

autopilot.title: Campaign Management on Autopilot
autopilot.description: Stop juggling 10 DM conversations. Manage all your collaborations, from negotiation to approval, from a single, clear, centralized dashboard. See who's late and who's submitted content at a glance.

paycheck.title: Your 100% Automated Paycheck
paycheck.description: Never create an invoice again. Never follow up on a payment again. As soon as the brand approves your content, our system generates the invoice and transfers the money to you automatically. You are a creator, not an accountant.

confidence.title: Work with Absolute Confidence
confidence.description: Never start a project hoping to get paid again. For every mission you accept, the brand's budget is locked and secured in our escrow account. Your payment is guaranteed before you even turn on your camera.

briefs.title: Clear Briefs, Zero Confusion
briefs.description: Say goodbye to "details that change" at the last minute. Our Smart Contract locks in the brief, deliverables, and budget. What is agreed upon is what is delivered. Protect your work and your time.

testimonials.quote: Finding brands that value authentic engagement over just follower counts was a constant struggle. VibeMatch's vetting process is a game-changer. I finally feel seen for the community I've built.
testimonials.name: Ghita A.

testimonials.quote: Chasing invoices and dealing with late payments was draining my creative energy. With VibeMatch, I know I'll get paid on time, every time. It's incredibly liberating.
testimonials.name: Ayman F.

testimonials.quote: As a creator, it’s hard to find partners who trust your vision. VibeMatch connects me with brands that understand the value of creative freedom and authentic storytelling.
testimonials.name: Soukaina

faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about how VibeMatch works for both brands and creators.

brandsFaq.question: How does VibeMatch ensure creator quality?
brandsFaq.answer: Our Trust Engine analyzes over 50 data points, including audience demographics, engagement rates, and past performance, to verify every creator. We ensure you connect with influencers who have a genuine, engaged audience that match your brand values.

brandsFaq.question: What is the pricing model for brands?
brandsFaq.answer: VibeMatch operates on a campaign-based fee structure. You only pay for the campaigns you launch. We are transparent about all costs upfront, so there are no hidden fees. Contact us for detailed pricing information tailored to your needs.

creatorsFaq.question: How do I get paid?
creatorsFaq.answer: We guarantee your payments. Once a campaign is completed and approved, funds are released to your VibeMatch account. You can then withdraw your earnings directly to your bank account. No more chasing invoices!

creatorsFaq.question: What are the requirements to join as a creator?
creatorsFaq.answer: We look for creators with an authentic connection to their audience, regardless of follower size. We evaluate engagement quality, content creativity, and niche relevance. If you create high-quality content and have a loyal community, we encourage you to apply.

generalFaq.question: What makes VibeMatch different from other platforms?
generalFaq.answer: VibeMatch is built on the pillars of Trust and Efficiency. Our unique Trust Engine ensures authentic collaborations, while our automated payment system protects creators. We are specifically focused on the Moroccan market, understanding its unique dynamics and fostering a community of top-tier local talent and brands.

generalFaq.question: What if I have a dispute?
generalFaq.answer: In the rare case of a disagreement between a brand and a creator, VibeMatch provides a dedicated dispute resolution process. Our support team will mediate the situation, review the campaign agreement and communication, and work towards a fair and timely resolution for both parties.

connect.title: Where Great Brands and Great Creators Connect.

waitlist.description: Be the first to experience the future of influencer marketing in Morocco.
waitlist.areYou: Are you a brand or a creator?

faqPage.description: Have a question? We're here to help. Explore our FAQ to find answers to common questions about VibeMatch.

stillQuestions.title: Still have questions?
stillQuestions.description: Our team is here to help. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

brandsFaq.question: What is VibeMatch's Trust Engine?
brandsFaq.answer: Our Trust Engine is a proprietary system that analyzes over 50 data points to vet influencers. It checks for fake followers, bot activity, and engagement authenticity to ensure you connect with creators who have a genuine, engaged audience, maximizing your campaign's ROI.

brandsFaq.question: How do I find influencers for my campaign?
brandsFaq.answer: VibeMatch offers advanced search and filtering tools. You can search for influencers based on niche, audience demographics, engagement rates, location, and more. Our platform will recommend the best matches for your brand based on your campaign goals and our Trust Engine data.

brandsFaq.question: How are payments handled on the platform?
brandsFaq.answer: Payments are held securely in escrow by VibeMatch. You fund the campaign upon agreement, and we release the payment to the creator only after you have approved the content and campaign deliverables have been met. This protects both parties and ensures a smooth collaboration.

creatorsFaq.question: How do I get paid?
creatorsFaq.answer: We guarantee your payments. Once a campaign is completed and approved, funds are released to your VibeMatch account. You can then withdraw your earnings directly to your bank account. No more chasing invoices!

creatorsFaq.question: What are the requirements to join as a creator?
creatorsFaq.answer: We look for creators with an authentic connection to their audience, regardless of follower size. We evaluate engagement quality, content creativity, and niche relevance. If you create high-quality content and have a loyal community, we encourage you to apply.

creatorsFaq.question: Is there a fee for creators?
creatorsFaq.answer: It is free for creators to join VibeMatch and create a profile. We take a small platform fee from your earnings on each completed campaign. This fee helps us cover payment processing, platform maintenance, and provide you with support and resources to grow your career.

generalFaq.question: What makes VibeMatch different from other platforms?
generalFaq.answer: VibeMatch is built on the pillars of Trust and Efficiency. Our unique Trust Engine ensures authentic collaborations, while our automated payment system protects creators. We are specifically focused on the Moroccan market, understanding its unique dynamics and fostering a community of top-tier local talent and brands.

generalFaq.question: What if I have a dispute?
generalFaq.answer: In the rare case of a disagreement between a brand and a creator, VibeMatch provides a dedicated dispute resolution process. Our support team will mediate the situation, review the campaign agreement and communication, and work towards a fair and timely resolution for both parties.

signupDialog.title: Join VibeMatch
signupDialog.description: Choose your path and start your journey with us.

brandJoinPage.description: Join our exclusive waitlist for brands and discover a more transparent and efficient way to collaborate with influencers.

1.title: Become a Founding Creator
1.description: Join an exclusive community and shape the future of creator collaborations.

2.title: Link Your Social Profiles
2.description: Add your Instagram and TikTok handles. We'll do a quick check to verify they're active.

3.title: Define Your Vibe
3.description: What are your main areas of expertise? Select the niches that best represent your content.

4.title: Professionalism Pledge
4.description: Our community is built on trust and reliability. Please confirm your commitment.

5.title: Application Submitted!
5.description: Thank you for applying to be a Founding Creator.

step1.description: As a Founding Creator, you'll get early access, influence our platform's development, and connect with a curated network of top-tier talent and brands. Let's get started.

step2.whyConnectLink: Why do I need to provide my handles?
step2.whyConnectAnswer: We use your handles for a one-time, automated analysis of your public profile data, like follower count and engagement rate. This helps us calculate your Trust Score and verify your audience's authenticity. We never store your login details or post on your behalf.

step4.description: To ensure VibeMatch remains a high-trust platform, we require all creators to commit to professional standards. This helps us maintain a reliable environment for everyone.
step4.pledge: I commit to meeting deadlines and not using fake engagement.
step4.creatorMandate: I accept the Terms of Use and I grant VibeMatch an exclusive mandate to invoice and collect payments on my behalf (Mandat d'Encaissement). I agree that VibeMatch deducts its commission before transferring the net balance.

finalStep.title: Thank you for your application.
finalStep.description: Our team is reviewing your profile and you will receive a response within 48 hours.

Your profile picture is the first impression you make. Make it a great one!
Tags help our algorithm match you with the most relevant campaign opportunities.

consent.title: Legal Consent (Required)
consent.brandMandate: I accept the Terms of Service and I authorize VibeMatch to secure these funds in Escrow until validation of the deliverables. I acknowledge that this payment discharges my debt towards the Creator.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.discrepancyNotice: In case of discrepancy, the French version governs.

object.title: 1. OBJECT AND INDEPENDENCE
object.p1: These Terms govern the use of the VibeMatch platform by Brands. The Brand acts as an independent client. These Terms do not create any employment contract or exclusive agency between VibeMatch and the Brand.

mandate.title: 2. PAYMENT MANDATE AND ESCROW
mandate.p1: By funding a campaign, the Brand expressly gives MANDATE to VibeMatch to:
mandate.li1: Secure the total amount (Creator fees + VibeMatch commission) in a dedicated escrow account.
mandate.li2: Release the funds to the Creator only after the Brand has validated the deliverables on the platform.

obligations.title: 3. BRAND'S OBLIGATIONS
obligations.li1: Provide a clear and complete brief for each campaign.
obligations.li2: Fund the escrow account before the start of the collaboration.
obligations.li3: Non-Circumvention: Not to circumvent VibeMatch by contracting directly with a creator introduced via the platform for a period of 12 months. Any violation will result in the immediate suspension of the account and a fixed penalty fee of 10,000 MAD (or 20% of the circumvented budget, whichever is higher) as damages.
obligations.li4: Validation: Validate or request revisions of the deliverables in a timely manner. IMPORTANT: In the absence of validation or a revision request within five (5) calendar days following delivery, the deliverables will be deemed automatically validated ('Validation Tacite'), triggering the release of funds to the Creator.

payments.title: 4. PAYMENTS
payments.p1: Payment is due upon hiring the creator(s).
payments.p2: Liberatory Effect: The Brand acknowledges that payment made to VibeMatch's escrow account constitutes a valid discharge of its debt towards the Creator. The Creator cannot claim payment directly from the Brand once VibeMatch has received the funds.

chargebacks.title: 4.1. CHARGEBACKS & PAYMENT DISPUTES
chargebacks.p1: The Brand agrees not to issue a chargeback via their bank or credit card provider for any reason if the deliverables have been validated (explicitly or tacitly). Any unjustified chargeback will be considered a fraudulent action. It will result in the immediate suspension of the account, and the debt will be handed over to a collections agency with an additional 20% penalty to cover administrative and legal recovery costs.

cancellation.title: 4.2. CANCELLATION & REFUNDS
cancellation.li1: Cancellation by Brand: If the Brand cancels a mission before the Creator has started work, funds are refunded minus a 15% (Excluding VAT / Hors Taxe) administrative fee. Once work has commenced, the full amount is due.
cancellation.li2: Non-Delivery: If a Creator fails to deliver within the agreed timeframe, the Brand is entitled to a full refund of the escrowed funds.
cancellation.li3: Disputes: In case of disagreement on quality, VibeMatch acts as a mediator. VibeMatch's decision on fund distribution is final.

forceMajeure.title: 5. FORCE MAJEURE
forceMajeure.p1: Neither party shall be liable for failure to perform its obligations if such failure is a result of Acts of God (including fire, flood, earthquake), government restrictions (bans), or major internet service provider failures. In such cases, the mission is suspended or cancelled without penalty.

termination.title: 6. TERMINATION
termination.p1: VibeMatch reserves the right to suspend or terminate an account in case of breach of these terms, fraud, or unethical behavior.

disclaimer.title: 7. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY
disclaimer.p1: The VibeMatch platform is provided "as is". While we strive to ensure the quality of creators through our Trust Engine, we do not guarantee specific campaign results.

law.title: 8. GOVERNING LAW
law.p1: These Terms are governed by Moroccan law. Any dispute will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the Commercial Court of Casablanca.

changes.title: 9. CHANGES TO TERMS
changes.p1: VibeMatch reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of any changes.

object.title: 1. OBJECT AND INDEPENDENCE
object.p1: These Terms (CGU) govern the use of the VibeMatch platform by content Creators / Influencers (hereinafter 'the Creator'). IMPORTANT - ABSENCE OF SUBORDINATION: The Creator acts as an independent service provider (Auto-Entrepreneur, Company, or Patenté). These CGU do not create any subordination link, employment contract, or exclusive agency between VibeMatch and the Creator. The Creator remains free in their schedule and means of production.

mandate.title: 2. INVOICING AND COLLECTION MANDATE
mandate.p1: To simplify administrative management, the Creator grants a Billing Mandate (Mandat de Facturation) to VibeMatch. Consequently:
mandate.li1: VibeMatch is authorized to generate and issue invoices in the name of and on behalf of the Creator addressed to the Clients.
mandate.li2: The Creator retains full tax liability for these invoices and must include them in their own tax declarations (Auto-Entrepreneur, etc.).
mandate.li3: VibeMatch is authorized to collect the funds into a sequestered account and deduct the Platform Commission before transferring the net balance.

obligations.title: 3. CREATOR'S OBLIGATIONS
obligations.li1: Provide real and verifiable audience statistics (Prohibition of buying 'Fake Followers').
obligations.li2: Respect the delivery deadlines (Deliverables) agreed upon in the offer.
obligations.li3: Retention Period: The Creator agrees to keep the sponsored content visible on their social media feed (Main Feed) for a minimum period of 30 days (or 24 hours for Stories) following publication. Archiving or deleting content before this period is considered a breach of contract.
obligations.li4: Not to publish defamatory, illegal, or content contrary to Moroccan good morals.
obligations.li5: Confidentiality: The Creator agrees to keep strictly confidential all information provided by the Brand (Briefs, Product Launches, Marketing Strategy) until the official campaign launch date. Any "leak" or premature publication will be considered a material breach liable for damages.

payments.title: 4. PAYMENT AND COMMISSION
payments.li1_t: Payment is only released after validation of the deliverables by the Client on the Platform.
payments.li2_t: VibeMatch undertakes to initiate the transfer within 5 working days after validation.
payments.li3_t: In consideration for the services of the Platform, a commission of 15% (Excluding VAT / Hors Taxe) is deducted from the total campaign amount.

circumvention.title: 5. NON-CIRCUMVENTION (ANTI-CIRCUMVENTION)
circumvention.p1: The Creator is strictly prohibited from soliciting, contracting with, or accepting direct payments from a Client introduced by VibeMatch, for a period of 12 months following the initial introduction. Any violation will result in the immediate suspension of the account and a fixed penalty fee of 10,000 MAD (or 20% of the circumvented budget, whichever is higher) as damages.

assignment.title: 6.1. Assignment:
assignment.p1: By accepting a mission and receiving payment, the Creator irrevocably assigns to the Client the economic rights (droits patrimoniaux) to the content created, specifically:
assignment.li1: Right of Reproduction & Representation: On the internet, social media, and digital platforms.
assignment.li3: Duration: For the legal duration of copyright protection (unless a specific shorter duration is defined in the Mission Brief).
assignment.li4: Purpose: Commercial, advertising, and promotional use.
assignment.li5: Adaptation Rights: The Creator expressly authorizes the Client to resize, crop, subtitle, or edit the content strictly for formatting purposes on different social media channels.
assignment.li6: Personality Rights: The Creator expressly authorizes the Client to use their name, image, voice, and likeness contained in the deliverables for the purposes defined herein.

warranty.title: 6.2. Warranty & Indemnification:
warranty.p1: The Creator guarantees that the content is original and does not infringe on the rights of third parties (music, image rights of others, trademarks). The Creator agrees to indemnify and hold harmless VibeMatch and the Client against any claims, damages, or legal fees arising from a breach of this warranty.

forceMajeure.title: 7. FORCE MAJEURE
forceMajeure.p1: Neither party shall be liable for failure to perform its obligations if such failure is a result of Acts of God (including fire, flood, earthquake), government restrictions (bans), or major internet service provider failures. In such cases, the mission is suspended or cancelled without penalty.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy (Law 09-08)
privacyPage.intro: This is a placeholder for your privacy policy. You should replace this with your actual policy.

processing.title: 1. DATA CONTROLLER
processing.content: Data is collected by VibeMatch, [Legal Form: e.g., Auto-Entreprise Walid Bezoui], with its head office located in Casablanca.

data.title: 2. DATA COLLECTED
data.p1: As part of its matchmaking activity, VibeMatch collects:
data.li2_t: Social media links, public audience statistics, SIRET/ICE.
data.li3_t: Bank details (for Creator transfers) - Note: Credit card data is managed exclusively by our secure payment provider.

purpose.title: 3. PURPOSE OF PROCESSING
purpose.p1: Data is processed for the following purposes:
purpose.li2: Calculation of the "Trust Score" to verify audience authenticity.

sharing.title: 4. DATA SHARING
sharing.p1: VibeMatch does not sell your data. It is shared only with:
sharing.li1: Clients (Brands): Only the public profile data and statistics of the Creator necessary for selection.
sharing.li2: Authorities: Upon judicial or fiscal requisition in accordance with Moroccan law.

rights.title: 5. YOUR RIGHTS (LAW 09-08)
rights.p1: In accordance with Law 09-08, you have the right to access, rectify, and object to the processing of your personal data. To exercise this right, contact us at: [Your Email: legal@vibematch.ma].

cookies.title: 6. COOKIES
cookies.p1: Our site uses technical cookies necessary for operation (session) and analytical cookies to improve the user experience.

hosting.title: 2. HOSTING
hosting.address: [Host's head office address, e.g., San Francisco, USA]

ip.title: 3. INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
ip.content: All graphic elements, source codes, logos, and texts of the VibeMatch site are the exclusive property of the editor. Any reproduction without authorization is prohibited.
